pickpocket.title: Pickpocket
pickpocket.prompt: You spot someone distracted with their bag open. How do you try?

market-swipe.title: Crowded market
market-swipe.prompt: Between stalls and people, a wallet peeks out. What do you do?

metro-bump.title: Subway shove
metro-bump.prompt: A sudden brake, bodies collide… and an easy pocket appears.

festival-confetti.title: Festival
festival-confetti.prompt: Music, confetti and distractions. What's your play?

hotel-lobby.title: Hotel lobby
hotel-lobby.prompt: People let their guard down. How do you try?

arcade-tokens.title: Arcade
arcade-tokens.prompt: Someone is counting tokens. No one is watching. What do you do?

library-silence.title: Library
library-silence.prompt: Total silence. An open bag. What's your method?

park-bench.title: Park bench
park-bench.prompt: A backpack sits aside. How do you approach?

street-magician.title: Street magician
street-magician.prompt: Everyone watches the trick. You watch the pockets.

coffee-queue.title: Coffee line
coffee-queue.prompt: The line moves slowly. Attention is low.

cinema-dark.title: Dark cinema
cinema-dark.prompt: Lights out. Do you take the moment?

museum-exhibit.title: Museum
museum-exhibit.prompt: People are hypnotized by a display case.

food-truck.title: Food truck
food-truck.prompt: Wallets out and people rushing to pay.

pier-crowd.title: Pier
pier-crowd.prompt: Tourists with backpacks and maps open.

street-performer.title: Street performer
street-performer.prompt: The sound covers footsteps and whispers.

bank-atm.title: ATM
bank-atm.prompt: Someone withdraws cash and pockets the receipt.

taxi-backseat.title: Taxi
taxi-backseat.prompt: A wallet slips onto the back seat.

rain-umbrella.title: Rainy day
rain-umbrella.prompt: Umbrellas bump. No one sees anything.

beach-towels.title: Beach
beach-towels.prompt: Towels, bags, distractions. What do you do?

concert-mosh.title: Concert
concert-mosh.prompt: The crowd moves. So do you.

flower-stall.title: Flower stall
flower-stall.prompt: A romantic gift. A visible wallet.

campus-hall.title: Campus hallway
campus-hall.prompt: Open backpacks and rushing to class.

stadium-queue.title: Stadium queue
stadium-queue.prompt: Everyone watches the entrance. Pockets, not so much.

vault.title: Three doors
vault.prompt: You're in. There are three doors. One has quick loot; the others, trouble.

storage-doors.title: Storage
storage-doors.prompt: Three metal doors. One hides an easy haul. Choose.

office-doors.title: Offices
office-doors.prompt: Empty hallway. Three unmarked doors. Which one pays?

basement-doors.title: Basement
basement-doors.prompt: Damp and silent. Three doors: noise, calm, luck.

backstage-doors.title: Backstage
backstage-doors.prompt: Behind the stage are three access points. One leads to loot.

dock-doors.title: Docks
dock-doors.prompt: Containers and three warehouse doors. Choose fast.

subway-doors.title: Tunnel
subway-doors.prompt: Three maintenance doors. One has supplies.

library-doors.title: Archive
library-doors.prompt: Three doors to the restricted archive. One has envelopes.

casino-doors.title: Casino
casino-doors.prompt: Three doors behind VIP. One is the good one.

hotel-doors.title: Private floor
hotel-doors.prompt: Three identical doors. One isn't fully latched.

museum-doors.title: Restricted area
museum-doors.prompt: Three doors with sketchy alarms. One fails.

trainyard-doors.title: Depot
trainyard-doors.prompt: Three rusty doors. One opens easily.

lab-doors.title: Laboratory
lab-doors.prompt: Three doors with panels. One is in test mode.

sewers-doors.title: Sewers
sewers-doors.prompt: Three hatches. One leads to a hideout.

attic-doors.title: Attic
attic-doors.prompt: Three old doors. One creaks… but gives.

theater-doors.title: Theater
theater-doors.prompt: Three doors backstage. One has a cashbox.

warehouse-doors.title: Industrial bay
warehouse-doors.prompt: Three hand-numbered doors. One holds the good stuff.

ship-doors.title: Ship hold
ship-doors.prompt: Three doors to the hold. Choose before someone returns.

castle-doors.title: Passage
castle-doors.prompt: Three stone doors. One is a shortcut to treasure.

clinic-doors.title: Clinic
clinic-doors.prompt: Three storage doors. One has a small safe.

stadium-doors.title: Stadium
stadium-doors.prompt: Three locker room doors. One has lost-and-found.

mall-doors.title: Mall
mall-doors.prompt: Three service doors. One leads to the register.

garage-doors.title: Garage
garage-doors.prompt: Three metal doors. One has no lock.

serverroom-doors.title: Server room
serverroom-doors.prompt: Three doors. One has resellable gear.

kitchen-doors.title: Kitchen
kitchen-doors.prompt: Three doors to storage. One has pricey supplies.

bakery-doors.title: Bakery
bakery-doors.prompt: Three back doors. One leads to the till.

gallery-doors.title: Gallery
gallery-doors.prompt: Three doors to the back room. One is poorly shut.

station-doors.title: Station
station-doors.prompt: Three cleaning doors. One hides a bag.

factory-doors.title: Factory
factory-doors.prompt: Three doors. One opens into a parts warehouse.

dockyard-doors.title: Shipyard
dockyard-doors.prompt: Three tool doors. One has new crates.

getaway.title: Getaway
getaway.prompt: Loot in hand. How much risk do you take to escape?

alley-chase.title: Alley
alley-chase.prompt: Footsteps behind. Sirens far. How do you escape?

rooftops.title: Rooftops
rooftops.prompt: Up the fire stairs. How much do you risk?

crowd-vanish.title: Disappear in the crowd
crowd-vanish.prompt: The crowd can save you… or expose you.

river-cross.title: Cross the river
river-cross.prompt: There's a bridge, a boat and a jump. Risk?

night-scooter.title: Night scooter
night-scooter.prompt: The night is ally. Or enemy. Decide.

smoke-bomb.title: Smoke screen
smoke-bomb.prompt: You can vanish… if it works.

subway-hop.title: Subway hop
subway-hop.prompt: The train arrives. Do you rush in or play it calm?

taxi-dash.title: Fast taxi
taxi-dash.prompt: A free cab. Pay and go, or bolt?

crowbar-route.title: Emergency route
crowbar-route.prompt: Locked doors. You could force one.

market-escape.title: Market escape
market-escape.prompt: Tight stalls. One mistake is expensive.

stairs-sprint.title: Stairs
stairs-sprint.prompt: Up or down. Every second counts.

festival-hide.title: Hide in the festival
festival-hide.prompt: Costumes and masks. How exposed are you?

parking-garage.title: Parking garage
parking-garage.prompt: Ramps, cars, cameras. Pick your risk.

canal-walk.title: Canal
canal-walk.prompt: You can follow the canal edge. Slippery.

construction-site.title: Construction site
construction-site.prompt: Scaffolds and gaps. You can vanish… or fall.

mall-exit.title: Mall exit
mall-exit.prompt: Three exits, two guards. What do you do?

hotel-elevator.title: Elevator
hotel-elevator.prompt: Slow elevator or fast stairs. Risk.

station-cameras.title: Cameras
station-cameras.prompt: Cameras track you. Do you try to dodge them?

rooftop-jump.title: Jump
rooftop-jump.prompt: There's a jump between buildings. Your call.

sewer-drop.title: Manhole
sewer-drop.prompt: You can drop into the sewers. Or not.

forest-edge.title: Forest edge
forest-edge.prompt: Darkness and branches. Safe path or shortcut.

harbor-boat.title: Harbor boat
harbor-boat.prompt: A boat breaks loose. Do you use it?
